episode: I had to do train a new starter at work so prepared some sheets and diagrams to help explain the role / product as well as give me reminders on what to cover.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I had to train a new starter at work so prepared some sheets and diagrams to help explain the role / product as well as give me reminders on what to cover.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a lot of effort! How did it go with the new starter?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It went very well.  I have been doing the job for 20 years so know the role but do sometimes get nervous when talking in front of a group.  This was a one one one so ok though.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Experience is key, and one-on-one sounds perfect for staying calm.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I'm much better at that.  Can tailor the talk to the individual.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great! Individual focus is always effective.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She was from a different industry so there was a lot of talk on the basics.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic! Covering basics ensures a solid foundation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Afterwards she always came to me for an explanations.  I think partly it was because I do without jargon and we get on well too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful! Clear communication and rapport make a big difference.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Ironically, while I don't like talking to a group, I am very good at one to one and maintaining good relations around the business.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Your individual skills shine, a boon to business ties!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Makes in easier to ask a favour of one another.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reciprocity strengthens bonds indeed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Communication and relationships are key to the role, which I kept reminder her of.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wise counsel! Relationships truly are the cornerstone of success.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It seems to have sunk in, so I must have done something right!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like you nailed it! Great job!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks.  Like most businesses, I got asked to do this but no credit or reward was given for the extra work as training was not part of my role.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's unfair. Recognizing effort is crucial.
